content.title: SERB Research Scientist Scheme
content.details: The SERB Research Scientist Scheme provides an opportunity for awardees of INSPIRE Faculty and Ramanujan Fellowships to continue their research activities for an additional period of two years after the completion of their regular tenure of five years.
benefits: Consolidated amount of ₹1,20,000/- per month as emolument
eligibility: Open only to INSPIRE Faculty and Ramanujan Fellows
Applicant should have completed or nearing completion of the tenure of INSPIRE Faculty or Ramanujan Fellowship
Upper age limit is 40 years at the time of submission of application
SRS can be availed only once by a candidate in his/her career
exclusions: SERB Research Scientists are not eligible to receive any other research project/fellowship from any Government or Non-Governmental source during the tenure of the Scheme.
documents_required: Endorsement Certificate from the Host Institute

faqs.question: What is the 'SERB Research Scientist Scheme'?
faqs.answer: The SERB Research Scientist Scheme provides an opportunity for awardees of INSPIRE Faculty and Ramanujan Fellowships to continue their research activities and explore regular positions during the intervening period.

faqs.question: What is the objective of the Scheme?
faqs.answer: The objective is to identify and provide a platform for sustainment of the research career of INSPIRE Faculty and Ramanujan Fellows for an additional period of two years after completion of their regular tenure.

faqs.question: Which is the implementing agency of this scheme?
faqs.answer: Science and Engineering Research Board, Government of India.

faqs.question: What are the eligibility criteria for applying?
faqs.answer: The scheme is open only to INSPIRE Faculty and Ramanujan Fellows with specific age and tenure requirements.

faqs.question: What is the duration of this fellowship?
faqs.answer: The scheme is tenable for a period of 2 years, extendable to one more year, subject to performance evaluation.
